explanation: Return types and thrown exceptions are not considered to be a part of the method signature. All of the options are considered components of a method declaration.
question: In Java, what does the method signature consist of? Choose all the applicable options.
correct_answers: Parameter list (number, type and order of its parameters)

explanation: The only required elements of a method declaration are the method's return type, name, a pair of parentheses, (), and a body between braces, {}. Reference: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/javaOO/methods.html
question: What are the only required elements of a method declaration ? Choose all the applicable options.

explanation: Valid ones are: %f, %d, %s , for floating point value, integer and strings.
question: What are valid format specifiers for the String.format() method?
